text: Arau tomaloke nirdista dinasamuhata allahaka smarana karaiba. Eteke konoba'i yadi khara-khedakai dudinate'i guci ahe tente tara kono papa naha’ba arau yiye alapa palamakai ahiba tarao kono papa naha’ba. E'ito tara babe yiye takbaraa aralambana karae, arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau jani thoraa ye, tomalokaka te'omra ocarate'i samabeta karaa ha’ba
